overview: The legends are back for more young, lustful starlets in volume 2 of this scorching hot age-play series. Lisa Ann is fed up with inconsiderate Sinn Sage's loud music, so she confronts the surly starlet and puts her in her place. The only problem is Sinn refuses to be controlled and a battle of will quickly gets out of hand. Which lusty lesbian will come out on top? Meanwhile, Nina Hartley is concerned about young Sara Stone's obvious depression. she counsels the heartbroken starlet and offers to make her feel better than any boy ever could. Next, Alyssa Reese is trying to move on from legendary lover Shayla Laveaux, but she makes on last plea that they get back together. When Shayla says no, Alyssa goes out to meet a new lover - or is she? And finally, legendary diva Teri Weigel isn't happy with her assistant (starlet Kristina Rose), and she doesn't mince words in telling her so. But Kristina thinks it's Teri who needs a lesson - and she's just the one to teach this lusty legend.
title: Legends & Starlets 2
